text:
ASWAD QAIYUM KHAN  
                                                              Safety Officer 
                                                                 aswadqaiyumkhan@yahoo.com   
                                                                          +91 8521667292
CAREER SUMMARY:
I am a graduate with three years of experience in the oil & gas plant construction projects as a safety officer and seven 
years of experience in the construction industry as a supervisor in India. I have international HSE certifications from 
NEBOSH, IOSH, OSHA, IRCA, HABC, CIEH, STI, IADC, IASP, ROSPA & HSI. I also have three national diplomas in 
Industrial Safety, Construction Safety & Food Safety from Bharat Sevak Samaj . I was responsible for  safety training, 
toolbox talks, ppe enforcement, workplace & welfare facilities inspection.
INTERNATIONAL CERTIFICATIONS :
▪ NEBOSH (UK)  ➖➖   Health and Safety at Work 
▪ IOSH (UK)     Managing Safely ➖➖
▪ OSHA (USA)     Construction Safety 30 Hours➖➖
▪ IRCA (UK)     OHSAS 18001 Lead Auditor ➖➖
▪ CIEH (UK)     Risk Assessment ➖➖
▪ HABC (UK)     Fire Safety ➖➖
▪ HABC (UK)     Health and Safety at Work➖➖
▪ ROSPA (UK)     Accident Investigation ➖➖
▪ STI (USA)     Scaffolding Inspector ➖➖
▪ IADC (USA)     HSE Rigpass ➖➖
▪ HSI (USA)     Medic First Aid ➖➖
▪ IASP (USA)     Advanced Diploma in Occupational Safety & Health➖➖
NATIONAL CERTIFICATIONS :
